snippet.title: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai - Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A fantasy real time strategy game set in Feudal Japan. Build your town, gather resources, explore new lands, trade with other cities and defend your town against the risen Yokai threat!
Whishlist now : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1303940/Faraway_Lands_Rise_of_Yokai
Website: https://www.farawaylandsgame.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/YyjPyjH
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MythEggStudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mytheggstudios
